ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: To get to the King room where the icy greaves drop, you go thru some halls off the Flag room.  There is this set of iron bars you need to raise to go thru and
ygData.messageBody:
To get to the King room where the icy greaves drop, you go thru some halls
off the Flag room. There is this set of iron bars you need to raise to go
thru and right there - i swear to the Gods that they have it drop your invis
- on purpose! There can be one or two gobs who went agro on me - maybe
there was one and he ran and got his buddy - but thank the Gods there were
2. I charmed one and made them fite. I dont think i could have taken one by
myself in a pure melee. And the fear of a train had me real scared. I really
really hate getting killed by greenies.

So my advice to you is try to tag along with a group going in and out.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 35th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk



-----Original Message-----
From: roleplay@... [mailto:roleplay@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 7:41 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Lambent Armor


From: <roleplay@...>

I am headed tonight to get the Icy Greaves from Permafrost. Then to Unrest
and Castle Mistmoore for
the other items.

I am only level 21 but my Invis worked great in Upper Guk. Is the same true
for getting to the
proper room in Permafrost? I know it is not in the undead areas but I have
to try them to.

Any suggestions or help on how to acquire these would be great!

Thanks
Ranian Aeleroth
Bard of the 21st song

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
